title: Mystery gift didnt show up
body: Hey guys, so i bought a mystery gift some minutes ago and the window which was supposed to show me the skin i won, didn't show up.Can anyone help me and tell me how to find out which skin i got?Ty for your answers.:)

replies.body:
Oh no! D:

I pulled up your account and it looks like you either received SSW Rengar or Captain Gangplank. Since you purchased two mystery skins one right after another, it's hard for me to know which one you missed.

I hope this helps, let me know if you have any other questions!
Well i found out where my purchase history is in the new store and discovered i received SSW rengar, but thank you for your answer.:)
